position.marginalia_text: She hath a great [chak] toth on the left stier of her mowth one the vpper jaw.

marginalia.translation: In the last night of december between 9 and twelve at [....] a girl was born in the year 1552. She hath a great [chak] toth on the left stier of her mowth one the vpper jaw.

position.marginalia_text: Die philippi et Jacobi anno 1530 nata Johanna soror Mri Perti mane hora .3.

marginalia.translation: On the day of Philip and Jacob in the year 1530, Johanna, the sister of minister [Perti?] was born, at three in the morning.

position.marginalia_text: 1553. Ver. 10 Martij hor.17. &Twothird; [cateti] Ver. 1554 [undecimo] martij [undecima] hora. m[inutae] 19 [secunda] 20 ibidem.

marginalia.translation: Spring 1553, 10th of March, 17 hours, 2/3 [???]. Spring 1554, 11th of March, 11th hour, 19 minutes, 20 seconds. Likewise.
